dta.DynameqNetwork¶

class dta.DynameqNetwork(dir, file_prefix)¶

Bases: dta.Network.Network

A Dynameq DTA Network.

__init__(dir, file_prefix)¶

Constructor. Reads the network in the given dir with the given file_prefix.

Methods

__init__ x.__init__(...) initializes x; see x.__class__.__doc__ for signature
DynameqNetwork.addCentroid
DynameqNetwork.addLink
DynameqNetwork.addNode
DynameqNetwork.getNodeForId
DynameqNetwork.write
addCentroid(newCentroid)¶

Verifies that newCentroid is a Centroid and that the id is not already used; stores it.

addLink(newLink)¶

Verifies that the newLink is a Link and that the id is not already used; stores it.

addNode(newNode)¶

Verifies that newNode is a RoadNode or a VirtualNode and that the id is not already used; stores it.

getNodeForId(nodeId)¶

Accessor for node given the nodeId. Looks at nodes, virtual nodes and centroids. Returns None if not found.

write(dir, file_prefix)¶
